= Which version should I get ? =

If you're trying Grafx2 for the first time, pick the latest stable version for your system. The list in the front page points to the stable versions.

If you want to test the latest changes, fixes and bugs, pick the work-in-progress versions (wip) that we upload regularly. They are available as source code archive (Linux) and Windows executable.
